title: Pullinangal Song Lyrics English Meaning
stanzas:
Pullinangal song lyrics with English meaning. Pullinangal lyrics is written by Na Muthukumar for 2.0 (2 Point O), a Tamil movie.  Here, I tried my best to translate the meaning of Pullinangal song in English .
Pullinangal Song Meaning
Lyrics in Thanglish
pullinangal
oh pullinangal
un pecharavam
kettu nindren

pullinangal
oh pullinangaaal
un keecholigal
vendugindren

mozhi illai
madham illai
yaadhum oorae
engiraaai
pul poondu athu kooda
sondham endru
solgiraai

kaatrodu vilaiyaada
oonjal engae
seigiraai
kadan vaangi
sirikkindra maanudan
nenjai koigiraai

uyirae ..
enthan chellame
un pol
ullam vendume.
ulagam alindhe
ponaalum
unnai kaakka
thondrume.

sel sel sel sel
sel sel sel
ellaigal illai sel
sel sel sel sel
ennaiyum yendhi sell

porkaalathu
kadhir oliyai
siragaisthu
varaverpai.
pen maanin
tholgalai
thottanaithu
thoonga veippaai

siru kaalin
men nadaiyil
perum kolam
pottu veippaai.
unai pole
parapatharkku
enai indru
yenga veippai

pullinangal
pullinangal
un petcharavam
kettu nindren

 English Translation
Hey flock of birds
Ooh birds
I stood still by hearing
your talking sound.

Hey flock of birds
Ooh birds
I'm praying to hear
ur chirping sound.

No language
No religion
You live
Everywhere.
You eat every small
Organisms as
its yours.

Where did you
built swing to
play in atmosphere.
You pluck the
heart of human
how live with dept

My soul..
my dear
Need a heart
like you
even if this
world ends,
love you save
you in extinction.

Fly fly fly
Fly fly fly
across all borders
Fly fly fly by
carrying me too

You begin rays of
gold age by
shooking your
feather.
you sit on  the
lady deer and
make it sleep
by hugging

With our little
legs  soft walk
you make
Big kolam
You make me
longing
to fly like
you in the sky

Hey flock of birds
Ooh birds
I stood by hearing
your sound.
